    • hasLowerPrecedence

      public static boolean hasLowerPrecedence(String str1, String str2)
      checks if the first operator has lower precedence than the second operator
      Parameters:
      str1 - the first operator to be compared
      str2 - the second operator to be compared
      Returns:
      true if the first operator has lower precedence than the second one and returns false otherwise
